alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Leavenworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 5:48PM CST until January 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and freezing drizzle expected. A light glaze of ice to a few hundredths of an inch of ice accumulation is expected. * WHERE...In Kansas, Atchison KS and Leavenworth Counties. In Missouri, Platte County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog and drizzle may result in visibility reduction to 1 mile or less overnight..
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
